amendment.description: Amendment makes technical changes to the Food for Progress rescission, the Public Law 480 program account rescission, and the Children and Family Services program rescission; eliminates two rescissions for the Ounce of Prevention and the GLOBE Programs; changes the requirement that NASA acquire land in Texas to only authorizing this acquisition; eliminates the language authorizing the transfer of the Yellow Creek NASA facility; and makes several citation corrections to the salvage timber provision and changes the termination of the timber salvage sale provision from September 30, 1997, to December 1996.
amendment.purpose: Amendment offered pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 176.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Livingston amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
